update repository_order_detail set repository_order_id = #{repositoryOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, receive_quality = #{receiveQuality,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, big_quality = #{bigQuality,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, free = #{free,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, exp_date = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, batch_code = #{batchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, warehouse_location = #{warehouseLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reject_quality = #{rejectQuality,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reject_comment = #{rejectComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_rate = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, in_count = #{inCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, right_count = #{rightCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, error_count = #{errorCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, survey_quality = #{surveyQuality,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, survey_date = #{surveyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, survey_user = #{surveyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, survey_address = #{surveyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, survey_result = #{surveyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, survey_target = #{surveyTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, error_plan = #{errorPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_cert = #{saleCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_reason = #{errorReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_temp_method = #{checkTempMethod,jdbcType=BIGINT}, check_user = #{checkUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, check_result = #{checkResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_state = #{saleState,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from repository_order_detail r left join ( select g.id as g_id, g.name, g.company_id, g.category_id, g.full_name, g.origin, g.jx, g.spec, g.serial, g.code, g.factory_id, g.unit, g.pack_unit, g.medium_pack, g.big_pack, g.pinyin, g.storage_condition, g.storage_description, g.permit_id, g.jx_id, g.is_foreign, g.is_prescription, g.special_managed, c.name as categoryName, f.name as factory, u1.name as unitName, u2.name as packUnitName from goods g left join good_category c on g.category_id = c.id left join factory f on g.factory_id = f.id left join unit u1 on g.unit = u1.id left join unit u2 on g.unit = u2.id ) t on r.goods_id = t.g_id where r.repository_order_id in
#{item}

select * from repository_order_detail r left join ( select g.id as g_id, g.name, g.company_id, g.category_id, g.full_name, g.origin, g.jx, g.spec, g.serial, g.code, g.factory_id, g.unit, g.pack_unit, g.medium_pack, g.big_pack, g.pinyin, g.storage_condition, g.storage_description, g.permit_id, g.jx_id, g.is_foreign, g.is_prescription, g.special_managed, c.name as categoryName, f.name as factory, u1.name as unitName, u2.name as packUnitName from goods g left join good_category c on g.category_id = c.id left join factory f on g.factory_id = f.id left join unit u1 on g.unit = u1.id left join unit u2 on g.unit = u2.id ) t on r.goods_id = t.g_id where r.repository_order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update repository_order_detail set check_status = 1, in_count = IFNULL(right_count, receive_quality), check_temp_method = #{checkTempMethod}, check_user = #{checkUser}, check_time = #{checkTime}, check_result = #{checkResult}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} where repository_order_id = #{orderId}

update repository_order_detail set check_status = 1, in_count = #{inCount}, right_count = #{rightCount}, error_count = #{errorCount}, error_plan = #{errorPlan}, sale_cert = #{saleCert}, error_reason = #{errorReason}, check_temp_method = #{checkTempMethod}, check_user = #{checkUser}, check_time = #{checkTime}, check_result = #{checkResult}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{detailId}
